response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it exceeds all expectations. We believe its value surpasses $8,000, but I understand that each individual might perceive its worth differently. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering this opportunity to acquire it for an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special offer tailored to discerning buyers like yourself, who appreciate the finer things. If you're interested in exploring this further, please let me know. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 12000}
